===================================================================
LINE UP

Brian Vollmer (vocals), Brent Doerner (guitar), Paul Hackman (guitar), Micke 

Uzelac (bass), Leo Niedebudek (drums)


A Canadian Hard Rock institution founded in Ontario during 1975 by the Doerner 

brothers, Brent on guitar and Brian on drums, renowned frontman BRIAN VOLLMER, 

guitarist Paul Hackman and bass player Keith &#039;Bert&#039; Zurbrigg. HELIX have made an 

indelible mark on the international Rock scene with their catchy Hard Rock 

numbers, notoriously racy videos and their undoubted staying power. The band have 

two platinum albums and four gold records to their name.

Based in Ontario, HELIX, initially titled THE HELIX FIELD BAND, cut their teeth 

with their first gig opening for MAX WEBSTER at their hometown Kitchener 

Auditorium. To earn their keep in these early days the band would back incoming 

American artists as a live backing band. In this capacity HELIX performed 

numerous gigs with 50&#039;s crooner DEL SHANNON. In their formative years one 

unsuccessful applicant for the position of bass player was one Michael J. Fox!
==================================================================
